name: PT. Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk
responsibilities: Conduct functional and non-functional testing to ensure software quality.
Create, document, and execute test cases and scenarios.
Identify, log, and report bugs using tools such as Taiga and TEMAN.
Collaborate with the development team to analyze and fix bugs and improve application performance.
Perform System Integration Testing (SIT).
Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) with users.
Perform regression testing after updates to ensure the stability of existing features.
Provide test result reports and improvement recommendations to relevant teams.

name: PT. Adira Dinamika Multi Finance
responsibilities: Develop positive and negative test scenarios based on specifications documented in the Business Requirements Document (BRD).
Execute test scenarios and document findings in Bug Reports.
Identify defects or incompatibilities between the product being developed and the specified user needs.
Track and manage bug issues using management systems such as SharePoint and Jira.
Communicate and collaborate with the development team to resolve findings and find appropriate solutions.
Perform API testing using tools such as Swagger and Postman to ensure compliance with existing specifications.
Prepare a release document (Quality Control Release) to state the readiness of the source code to be applied to UAT and Production environments.

name: PT. Adira Dinamika Multi Finance
responsibilities: Determined the needs of users who would receive the technical documentation.
Explored the use of application products and discussed further with stakeholders.
Completed product documents using photos, images, and diagrams that enhanced user understanding (did some revision if updated products were needed).

Generated supporting documents for the products, namely Bank Scenario, Technical Specification Documents, Artifact Documents, Application Programming Interface (API) documents, Data Dictionary, and User Manuals.
Performed application testing (manual) and API testing using Swagger/Postman.
Created training materials for each portfolio owned by the company.

name: CV. Komunitas Pariwisata Toba
responsibilities: Successfully developed 6 tourist village websites, on developing tourist village websites in Lake Toba as super priority destinations at the Directorate of Regional Destination Development 1 for the Fiscal Year 2020
Survey similar applications and collect information from stakeholders in website development
Designing business processes, databases, and tourist village website interface displays
Documenting the process of developing a tourist village website into a Technical Document
Prepare test scenario documents and presentation materials to be presented to end users
Perform testing on website designs and website applications internally and directly to end users
Create a User Manual for the use of a tourist village website
Conduct training on the use of tourist village websites for end users

name: PT. Dura (Yong Solution)
responsibilities: Building a web-based Social Dining Application, which is a medium for the people of South Korea to hold meetings
Analyze the Korean language application design provided by the client
Designing a Social Dining application business process
Documenting documents needed in developing Web-based applications, namely Technical Documents, ToR (Term Of Reference), MoM (Minutes of Meeting), and LA (Log Activity).

name: PT. Guardia Teknologi Indonesia
responsibilities: Build a Jubelio Finance System, a medium for recording customer fines on the use of the Jubelio platform so that it helps companies increase revenue
Re-engineering the Analisa Data Penjualan Jubelio system to help customers improve their sales strategy
